interestingcomments.content:
Camera dust /!/ I bought a kit to clean my camera sensor, but no dust came out. Can my camera be ruined because of dust ?

And i did clean a very amount of times.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent:

interestingcomments.content: Cleaning DSLR Sensor (Nikon D750) /!/ Looking for guidance on whether to clean or not clean (my sensor myself).  I've searched dozens of blogs, sites, and camera manufacturers on the question. The manufactures warn you that cleaning the sensor invalidates your warranty, so go with an authorized reseller. Unfortunately I live in a small enough area where an authorized reseller is over 200 miles away. What I'm really looking for is guidance on the risk of doing the cleaning myself. How difficult is it to do (correctly)  and can the risk of the worst happening (having to replace the sensor) be quantified? Any and all guidance and advice is welcome.
